ca.ualberta.cmput301.t03.inventory

Class InspectItemController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cmput301.t03.inventory.InspectItemController

  • public class InspectItemController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for inspecting an item from another user's inventory.

    • Constructor Detail

      • InspectItemController

        public InspectItemController(View v,
                             Activity activity,
                             User owner,
                             Inventory inventory,
                             Item item)
        Default constructor for InspectItemController. Used to initialize an instance of the InspectItemController from a relevant View on an instance of the Inventory model.
        Parameters:
        v - The EditItemView attached to this controller
        activity - Used to switch to another activity (Trade)
        owner - The user that owns the inventory the item belongs to.
        inventory - The inventory model the item belongs to.
        item - The item being inspected.

    • Method Detail

      • proposeTradeButtonClicked

        public void proposeTradeButtonClicked()
        Onclick listener for Propose button. Starts a new TradeOfferComposeActivity and passes along the borrower, owner and item details to the new activity.

      • cloneItem

        public Item cloneItem()
               throws java.io.IOException,
                      ServiceNotAvailableException
        Listens for an item click. Called by the "clone item" view widget. Results in a full copy of the item being added to the User's Inventory. As well, the photos will be cloned
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        ServiceNotAvailableException
